name: Leisure Suit Larry 1 - In the Land of the Lounge Lizards

game.custom-name: Leisure Suit Larry 1 - In the Land of the Lounge Lizards

content:
files:
- SteamSetup.exe: https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/client/installer/SteamSetup.exe
game:
  appid: '763970'
  arch: win64
  args: -nojoy -applaunch 763970
  custom-name: Leisure Suit Larry 1 - In the Land of the Lounge Lizards
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Steam/Steam.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating 64-bit prefix ...
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- move:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/
    src: SteamSetup.exe
- chmodx: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/SteamSetup.exe
- task:
    app: d9vk
    arch: win64
    description: Vulkan ...
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: arial
    arch: win64
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    args: /S
    description: Steam ...
    executable: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/SteamSetup.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: win10
    arch: win64
    description: Windows version 10 ...
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
system:
  disable_compositor: true
  pulse_latency: true
  xboxdrv: xboxdrv
wine:
  Audio: pulse
  dxvk: true
  overrides:
    winedbg.exe: d
